pageContext.claim: “Pathetic excuse by London Mayor Sadiq Khan who had to think fast on his "no reason to be alarmed" statement. MSM is working hard to sell it!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump doubles down on taking London Mayor Sadiq Khan's comments out of context, making it seem as though Khan was playing down the deadly attacks on June 3 on the London Bridge and Borough Market. Khan said there is "no reason to be alarmed" about the increased police presence following the attacks. Khan condemned the attacks: "I am appalled and furious that these cowardly terrorists would deliberately target innocent Londoners and bystanders enjoying their Saturday night."
